edge: Raised at an orphanage under Sister Clara, Carnby lost his memory when he was ten years old.
Recruited by Bureau 713 at the age of twenty, gaining knowledge on the paranormal soon after.
Current assignment is investigating his past along with researching the disappearance of the Abkani.
Knows about the Abkani and their culture. Dating relationship with Edward.
One of Carnby's few trusted allies and friends, head of the medical unit of Bureau 713.
Worked on a power generator with Agent Turner, killed by Fischer.
owner of the orphanage which cared for Edward. In the '80s, she was persuaded by Hudgens to allow experiments on the orphans.
a former Agent of Bureau 713 who went missing in action in the 1980s. He and Hudgens were in charge of the investigation of the disappearance of gold-miners at Brutan Goldmine.
